nodes.name: Welcome Email

parameters.message:
=Dear {{$node["Attendee Registrations"].json["Great, can we get your full name?"]}},

Welcome to n8nConf, the world's largest no-code automation conference!

This email is to confirm your registration to the following sessions:
- {{$node["Attendee Registrations"].json["Which sessions would you like to attend?"].join('\n- ')}}

You should receive Google Calendar invites to these events on your email. Please consult those for the Google Meet joining information.

You can also interact with the rest of the community via our Mattermost chat. We created an account just for you!
Look for the channel corresponding to your session to join the discussion!

Login URL: {{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
Username: {{$node["Create Account"].json["username"]}}
Password: {{$node["Create Account"].parameter["password"]}}

Remember to change your password immediately after your first login!

If you have any troubles with joining the event, or using the chat rooms; please feel free to let us know on support@n8nconf.com

We look forward to your participation!

Best,
Team n8n
parameters.subject: Welcome to n8nConf

nodes.notes: This gmail node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Typeformtrigger Workflow

Automated workflow: Typeformtrigger Workflow. This workflow processes data and performs automated tasks.

## Nodes:
- 10 total nodes
- Includes error handling
- Follows best practices

## Usage:
1. Configure credentials
2. Update environment variables
3. Test workflow
4. Deploy to production
